column4: Don't open anything! Or it all will blow up!!! AAAAAAAAAAAH!... He means GParted, of course :/

he told me to open gparted, and then I asked a question about what I was doing with it, and then he said don't open it. I didn't know if he was saying don't open my harddrive within gparted, or don't open the program, or what, or why.
Well, you can't "open" a hard drive :/
it's not completely alien to hear people refer to accessing files as 'opening' them, since you often click an icon which looks like clicking an icon to open a program.
